__TOC__


=== Overview ===

Holding some form of real life training event(s) to introduce people to Ubuntu and help to educate current users

=== Detail ===

To hold some form of real life training event, be this alongside another event initially, or as a stand alone event with several tracks. If done as a standalone event, get local press coverage to help raise awareness of Ubuntu.

=== Resources Required ===

* "Teachers"
* Volunteer helpers
* A location
* Syllabus/training materials
* Classrooms of some sort

=== Interested people ===

* MattDaubney - Time / brain power / a couple of classroom computers
* AlanBell - Time / classroom computers / sponsorship if targeted at businesses
